mapper.update:
update m_user
innerCode = #{innercode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
realName = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
aliasName = #{aliasname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastModifiedTime = #{lastmodifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update m_user set innerCode = #{innercode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realName = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, aliasName = #{aliasname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastModifiedTime = #{lastmodifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from m_user where name=#{name} and password=#{password}
